requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video title "No Equipment 20 Minute Bodyweight Workout | Follow Along" explicitly states that the workout requires "No Equipment," and the description reinforces this by emphasizing the workout is performed using only bodyweight, with phrases like "require ZERO equipment" and "all you will need is your bodyweight."
